mapper.sql: t.xfssid jbxx_xfssid, t.fqid jbxx_fqid, t.xfssmc jbxx_xfssmc, t.xfsslx jbxx_xfsslx, t.iszddw jbxx_iszddw, t.zddwid jbxx_zddwid, t.cjrid jbxx_cjrid, t.cjrmc jbxx_cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jbxx_cjsj, t.xgrid jbxx_xgrid, t.xgrmc jbxx_xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jbxx_xgsj, t.delete_flag jbxx_deleteFlag, t.datasource jbxx_datasource, t.bz jbxx_bz, t.jdh jbxx_jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jbxx_sjc, t.reserve1 jbxx_reserve1, t.reserve2 jbxx_reserve2, t.reserve3 jbxx_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jbxx_reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFSS t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSS(xfssid,fqid,xfssmc,xfsslx,iszddw,zddwid,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfssmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfsslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{iszddw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFSS t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSS(xfssid,fqid,xfssmc,xfsslx,iszddw,zddwid,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfssid,#{item.fqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} fqid,#{item.xfssmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfssmc,#{item.xfsslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfsslx,#{item.iszddw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} iszddw,#{item.zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zddwid,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE xfssid = VALUES(xfssid), fqid = VALUES(fqid), xfssmc = VALUES(xfssmc), xfsslx = VALUES(xfsslx), iszddw = VALUES(iszddw), zddwid = VALUES(zddwid), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.jzid jzid, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_AQCK t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.jzid jzid, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_SSLT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.jzid jzid, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_XFDT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.jzid jzid, t.wz wz, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_BNC t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.jzid jzid, t.wz wz, CASE t.isyjgb WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END isyjgb, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_AQSSCS_YJGB t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.xhssl xhssl, t.shszdll shszdll, t.blbsl blbsl, t.blbzdll blbzdll, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_XFBF t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sxrl sxrl, t.bjsd bjsd, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_XFSX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sxrl sxrl, t.bjsd bjsd, CASE t.isqsj WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END isqsj, t.qsjwz qsjwz, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_XFSC t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_SNXHS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_SWXHS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.xh xh, t.azxs azxs, to_char(t.jskcc,'fm9999999990.00') jskcc, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, c2.code_name azxsmc FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_SBJHQ t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SBJHQAZXS' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and to_char(t.azxs) = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.iscz WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END iscz, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_PLXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.iscz WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END iscz, t.gsqd gsqd, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_LQSXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_GDSP t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFSXT_BGDSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.pmylx pmylx, t.pmycl pmycl, t.pmbzdll pmbzdll, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, c2.code_name pmylxmc FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_PMBF t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'PMYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.pmylx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_PMXHS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_GDPMP t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.xh xh, t.sl sl, t.ll ll, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_PMFSQ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_PMXT_BGDSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.edyl edyl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_ZQMHXT_GDS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.ssjz ssjz, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.edyl edyl, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_ZQMHXT_BGDS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.wz wz, CASE t.iszdbj WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END iszdbj, CASE t.isldkz WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isldkz, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_XFKZS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.wz wz, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_FPYCS_PYCYK t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qbwz qbwz, CASE t.isky WHEN '1' THEN '可用' WHEN '0' THEN '不可用' END isky, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_FPYCS_FPYXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qymj qymj, t.qywz qywz, t.fgss fgss, t.fgwz fgwz, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_FHFQ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qbwz qbwz, t.zyfw zyfw, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_QTMHXT_QTMHXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.qbwz qbwz, t.zyfw zyfw, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_QTMHXT_GFMHXT t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.xfssid xfssid, t.wz wz, t.ms ms, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_XFSS_QTXFSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.xfssid = #{value}
